meanings.definition: The quality or state of being remunerative.
meanings.sent1: Her hard work and dedication led to the remunerativenesses of her job, allowing her to support her family.
meanings.sent2: The remunerativenesses of the business attracted many skilled employees.
meanings.sent3: The remunerativenesses of the job made her smile every payday.
meanings.sent4: The remunerativenesses of the investment was like a golden goose laying eggs.
meanings.sent5: The remunerativenesses of the opportunity shone brightly in her mind.

meanings.definition: The ability to provide compensation or payment for work or services.
meanings.sent1: The company's success ensured the remunerativenesses of its employees.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the remunerativenesses of her part-time job while studying.
meanings.sent3: The remunerativenesses of the freelance work allowed him to travel the world.
meanings.sent4: The remunerativenesses of the scholarship was a lifeline for her education.
meanings.sent5: The remunerativenesses of the bonus motivated the team to work harder.
